\Aura\Signal\Handler

Tags

todo

Properties

$sender

$sender : object|string

Handle signals from this sender. This can be an object, in which case the Handler will match only signals from that object, or a class name, in which case the Handler will match signals from any instance of that class.

Type

object|string

Tags

todo

$signal

$signal : string

Handle this signal from the sender.

Type

string

Tags

todo

$callback : callback

Use this callback to handle the signal.

Tags

todo

exec()

exec(object $origin, string $signal, array $args) : null|array

Execute the handler: if the originating object matches the required sender, and the signal matches the required signal, then run the callback and return the results.

Parameters

object $origin

The originating object that sent the signal.
string $signal

The signal sent by the originating object.
array $args

Arguments for the callback, which will be invoked if the sender and signal match this Handler.

Returns

null|array —

An array of parameters suitable for creating a Result object, or null if the origin and signal did not match this Handler.

Tags

todo
